attributes.action: Trevor Hicks and Margaret Aspinall should be given an honour medal for their fight for justice for the victems and survivors of Hillsborough
attributes.additional_details:
Trevor Hicks and Margaret Aspinall should be honoured for their fight for justice for the 96 victems of the Hillsborough tragedy and for the survivors.
23 years fighting with dignity for the truth and for justice alongside the other families, these people deserve to be publically honoured and recognised for their hard work and commitment to justice and the truth!
